content.prompt:
Directions: You will hear a brief exchange between two people. From the four choices, choose the most appropriate remark that the ﬁrst speaker could make in response to the remark of the second speaker.

NOW GET READY FOR THE BRIEF EXCHANGE:

choices.label: Ich war doch schon gestern im Museum.
Ich möchte in das Museum für moderne Kunst.
Ich habe hier irgendwo meine Eintrittskarte verloren.

unit.text: 5: Factors That Impact the Quality of Life

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
